required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PF-07321332/Ritonavir and Ritonavir on Dabigatran Study in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A PHASE 1, OPEN-LABEL, 3-TREATMENT, 6-SEQUENCE, 3-PERIOD CROSSOVER STUDY TO ESTIMATE THE EFFECT OF PF-07321332/RITONAVIR AND RITONAVIR ON THE PHARMACOKINETICS OF DABIGATRAN IN HEALTHY PARTICIPANTS

brief_summary.textblock: This is a drug-drug interaction study to assess the effects of PF-07321332/ritonavir and ritonavir on the Pharmacokinetic (PK) of dabigatran in healthy volunteers. PK will be evaluated for PF-07321332 and ritonavir. Dabigatran is being utilized as a P-gp substrate

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a Phase1, open-label,3-treatment, 6-sequence, 3-period crossover study to estimate the effect of PF-07321332/ritonavir and ritonavir on the Pharmacokinetics of dabigatran in healthy participants

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time zero to infinity (AUCinf) of dabigatran when administer with PF-07321332/ritonavir
primary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment A; pre-dose, and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of dabigatran when administered with PF-07321332/ritonavir
primary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment A; pre-dose, and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: AUCinf of dabigatran when administered with multiple doses of ritonavir
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment C; Pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of dabigatran when administered with multiple doses of ritonavir
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment C; pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatments A, B and C; through study completion of approximately 1.5 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Change From Baseline in Laboratory Abnormalities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatments A, B, and C; through study completion of approximately 1.5 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Change From Baseline in Vital Signs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment A, B, and C; through study completion of approximately 1.5 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Abnormalities in Physical Examination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment A, B, and C; through study completion of approximately 1.5 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Change in Electrocardiogram (ECG) Findings
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatment A, B, and C; through study completion of approximately 1.5 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of dabigatran
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatments A, B and C; Pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours
Treatments A, B and C; pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose
Treatments A, B, C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: AUCtau (area under the curve of the dosing interval) of PF-0321332
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatments A, B and C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose
Treatments A, B and C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose
Treatments A, B and C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose
Treatments A, B and C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) of PF-0321332
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Treatments A, B and C: pre-dose and 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, and 48 hours post-dose

intervention.description: A single dose of Dabigatran on Day 1
PF-07321332/ritonavir twice daily (BID) for Days 1 and 2 Single dose of Dabigatran on Day 2
Ritonavir BID on Days 1 and 2 Single dose of Dabigatran on Day 2

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg.m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs)
- Female participants must have a negative pregnancy test
Exclusion Criteria:
- Positive test for SARS-Co-V2 at the time of screening or Day -1
- Active pathological bleeding or risk of bleeding
- Positive urine drug test
- History of sensitivity to heparin or heparin induced thrombocytopenia
- Participants who have been vaccinated for COVID-19 in the past 7 days

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
